mapper.update: update t_order_manage set order_state = #{orderState}, update_time = now(), update_user = #{updateUser} where is_delete = 0 and order_code = #{orderCode}
mapper.select: select torder.order_code orderCode, torder.order_state orderState, tuser.user_name userName, tuser.user_phone userPhone from t_order_manage torder, t_store_bind tbind, t_store_information tstore, t_user_infomation tuser where torder.is_delete = 0 and tstore.shop_con_user = #{userCode} and tbind.shop_code = tstore.shop_code and torder.user_code = tbind.user_code and torder.user_code = tuser.user_code

select torderg.good_code goodCode, torderg.orderG_name goodName, torderg.orderG_s_price goodSale, torderg.orderG_num goodNum, torderg.orderG_image goodImage from t_order_ordergoods torderg where torderg.order_code = #{orderCode} and torderg.is_delete = 0

select torder.order_code orderCode, tstore.provinceCode provinceCode, tstore.cityCode cityCode, tstore.distinctCode distinctCode, tstore.shop_detail_address deliveryStore, torder.create_time orderCreateTime, torder.order_state orderState, tuser.user_name userName, tuser.user_phone userPhone from t_order_manage torder, t_user_infomation tuser, t_store_information tstore where torder.order_code = #{orderCode} and torder.is_delete = 0 and torder.shop_code = tstore.shop_code and torder.user_code = tuser.user_code

select good_code goodCode, orderG_name goodName, orderG_s_price goodSale, orderG_pre goodPrec, orderG_num goodNum, orderG_image goodImage from t_order_ordergoods where order_code = #{orderCode} and is_delete = 0

SELECT t3.name1 ProvinceName, t3.code1, t3.name2 cityName, t3.code2, t4.dict_name distinctName, t4.dict_code FROM ( SELECT t1.dict_code code1, t1.dict_name name1, t1.dict_parent_node parentcode1, t2.dict_code code2, t2.dict_name name2, t2.dict_parent_node parentcode2 FROM t_dict t1 LEFT JOIN t_dict t2 ON t1.dict_code = t2.dict_parent_node WHERE t1.dict_parent_node IS NULL ) t3 LEFT JOIN t_dict t4 ON t3.code2 = t4.dict_parent_node having code1 = #{provinceCode} AND code2 = #{cityCode} and dict_code = #{distinctCode}
